description:
This amazing and attractive app is offered by Payal Lakhani. This app has complete cricket solution. Every function/feature in this is amazing and designed with respect to cricket lovers. The app has following features.

- Live Cricket Scores
- Live IPL
- Live Asia Cup
- Live Cricket Line
- Ball by ball update
- Latest cricket news
- All important matches in one click
- Popular Series
- Live Cricket TV
- Results of past matches
- Schedule of upcoming matches
- Smooth and stable UI
- Live Cricket TV Streaming
- Get Ball By Ball Live Cricket Score
- Quick and instant support
- Detailed scorecard with match venue information

This app allows you to watch any cricket match score no matter where you are. You just need to have an internet connection and a Smartphone and you will be good to go.

The NBA App is your home for the season.

Get free, instant access to the latest schedule, scores, highlights, news, and behind the scenes stories from across the National Basketball Association.

In the free NBA App, fans get access to:
- Live scores, stats and standings
- The latest basketball news, highlights, game previews and recaps.
- The full season schedule across national and local broadcast partners.*
- Stories from across the NBA to bring you closer to the action.
- Watch original series that bring you inside the league
- Personalized live updates on your favorite teams and players
- Live free access to postgame press conferences after every game
- Play free games to test your basketball knowledge with NBA Play

* National broadcast partners include ABC, ESPN, NBC, Peacock, and Amazon Prime Video. 

Want even more? Watch live games with NBA League Pass and stream your favorite NBA teams and players.

NBA League Pass subscribers have access to:
- Streaming NBA games live and on-demand.**
- Alternate streams including Data Mode and NBA Hoopervision
- Local language broadcasts
- Overlays with player stats, scores of other games, and live odds without leaving the game
- Mobile optimized game streams for phones and tablets
- Access to stream NBA TV
- Access to the NBA archives to stream the most memorable games and moments.

League Pass Premium subscribers get access to:
- Gametime is anytime with download for later to watch NBA games on the go or offline.
- Commercial free viewing on up to 3 devices
- In-Arena Entertainment at game breaks, so you feel like you are there.

** Blackouts and restrictions apply in the US and Canada.

NBA ID has rewards for every fan. Sign up and get access to:
- Member-only benefits like free ticket giveaways and sports merch deals
- Free live game nights and exclusive content
- Daily fan perks during NBA ID Member Days
- Upgraded fan experiences at NBA events
- Voting on top league moments and influence the game
- Earning badges that show off your fandom

Play free games with NBA play to test your basketball knowledge and show how well you know the sport. Games include:
- Full Court Guess
- Hoop Connect
- NBA IQ
- NBA Rank
- Player Path
- NBA Blast
- Trivia

Get the best free NBA coverage, including pre-season games, global games, NBA Emirates NBA Cup, Christmas Day games, NBA All-Star Weekend and All-Star Game, NBA Playoff games, NBA Finals, NBA Draft, NBA Summer League, and NBA 2K League. The official NBA app features highlights of every shot, dunk, nothing but net, and more from the Atlanta Hawks, Boston Celtics, Brooklyn Nets, Charlotte Hornets, Chicago Bulls, Cleveland Cavaliers, Dallas Mavericks, Denver Nuggets, Detroit Pistons, Golden State Warriors, Houston Rockets, Indiana Pacers, LA Clippers, Los Angeles Lakers, Memphis Grizzlies, Miami Heat, Milwaukee Bucks, Minnesota Timberwolves, New Orleans Pelicans, New York Knicks, Oklahoma City Thunder, Orlando Magic, Philadelphia 76ers, Phoenix Suns, Portland Trail Blazers, Sacramento Kings, San Antonio Spurs, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz, and Washington Wizards.

Current NBA League Pass and NBA TV subscribers can access their subscription by logging into the App.

Purchase NBA League Pass or NBA TV, and you will be automatically billed through Apple every 30 days (monthly packages) or every 365 days (annual packages) until you cancel your subscription. Refunds are not available after subscriptions have been activated.

Please visit support.watch.nba.com to contact the support team if you are experiencing any issues.

Terms of Use: http://www.nba.com/news/termsofuse
Privacy Policy: http://www.nba.com/news/privacy_policy.html

The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.  

Key features: 
•	Exclusive content – Access behind-the-scenes footage of Jude’s life away from the spotlight.  
•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

Stay ahead of the game with "Live Cricket TV - HD Streaming," your ultimate source for real-time live cricket scores. Our app provides comprehensive live match updates, upcoming match schedules, and the latest cricket news, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action. Whether you're following the Cricket World Cup, IPL, or any other major tournament, our app keeps you informed with instant live score updates.

Are you tired of missing out on crucial moments in your favorite cricket matches? With "Live Cricket TV - HD Streaming," you can access real-time cricket live scores right at your fingertips. Our app offers detailed live match updates and a live match scoreboard to keep you updated on every run, wicket, and over. 

"Live Cricket TV - HD Streaming" also provides upcoming match schedules, so you can plan your viewing in advance. Never miss an important game again with our easy-to-navigate interface and push notifications. Additionally, our app brings you the latest live cricket news and match analysis, ensuring you are well-informed about your favourite teams and players.

Key Features:

- Cricket Live Line & Scores: Get real-time live cricket scores and detailed cricket live line updates.
- Live Match Updates: Stay informed with instant live match updates and highlights.
- Upcoming Match Schedules: Plan your viewing with detailed upcoming match schedules.
- Live Match Scoreboard: Access live match scoreboards and comprehensive stats.
- Live Cricket News: Stay updated with the latest live cricket news and events.
- Match Analysis: Get in-depth analysis and insights for ongoing and upcoming matches.
- User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a seamless and easy-to-navigate experience.
- Experience the best app for live cricket scores, offering reliable and fast updates. Download "Live Cricket TV - HD Streaming" now and keep track of every run, wicket, and over with our detailed live match updates.

Our app ensures you are always in the loop with the latest cricket happenings. Whether you are a casual fan or a cricket enthusiast, "Live Cricket TV - HD Streaming" provides everything you need to stay updated with live cricket scores and match details. Get ready to immerse yourself in the world of cricket with comprehensive coverage and accurate live score updates.

For an uninterrupted experience, consider subscribing to access all app features without ads through an auto-renewing subscription available on a weekly, monthly, or yearly basis. Manage your subscription settings and turn off auto-renewal within your iTunes Account Settings after purchase, ensuring flexibility and control over your subscription.

Current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at:

Link to Privacy Policy: https://sbapps001.blogspot.com/p/privacy-policy.html

We are just providing facilities to cricket lovers nonetheless. If you find any problem or think we are infringing any rights, kindly reach us directly and we will fully cooperate with you. Thank you.

Live Cricket TV - HD Streaming does not tolerate any copyright infringement on the site. It is our policy to respond to clear notices of alleged copyright infringement. If you are a copyright owner or an agent thereof, and you believe that any content on this app has objectionable content or violating your copyrights, please contact us at mail Those content will be permanently removed!

Discover most of ESPNcricinfo’s content in the app. Widest cricket coverage across the world including IPL, PSL, BPL, BBL, CPL, WBBL, The Ashes, ICC Cricket World Cup, T20 World Cup, The Hundred, County Championship, Ranji Trophy, Sheffield shield.

Live Cricket TV Sports is a cricket app that allows you to watch live matches score, Schedule and analysis, and keep track of upcoming matches. Whether you're a beginner or an expert, Live Cricket TV Sports has something for everyone.

Live Cricket TV Sports is the perfect app for cricket fans of all levels.
This is a Live Cricket TV Sports and the cricket-related latest update and schedules app.

Welcome to Live Cricket Score, the ultimate app for every cricket enthusiast! Stay connected to the world of cricket with our comprehensive features that bring the game closer to you than ever before. Whether you're a casual fan or a die-hard cricket lover, Live Cricket Score is designed to keep you updated with every ball and every match. Here’s what you can look forward to:

Main Features:

1. Live Cricket Score
Never miss a moment of the action with real-time updates on live cricket scores. Our fast and accurate live score updates ensure you are always in the know about every run, wicket, and milestone.

2. Live Cricket Match Details
Dive deep into the details of every live cricket match. From player statistics and team line-ups to ball-by-ball commentary and detailed match summaries, get all the information you need at your fingertips.

3. Upcoming Match Schedules
Plan your cricket viewing with ease by checking the schedules of upcoming matches. Stay informed about the dates, times, and venues of all the exciting fixtures lined up, so you never miss a game.

4. Point Table
Here you can view all types of point table like ODI, T20 and test matches.

Thrilling experience to watch every cricket match, league match, Domestic and International Match.

Download it today and start enjoying all the features it has to offer!

The CNF (Check N' Follow) is your go-to sports hub for live scores, schedules, and local games — built to be fast, simple, and perfectly native on your device.

Switch between sports effortlessly, explore match stats, and add games to your favorites or calendar in seconds. No logins, no noise — just pure, real-time sports made easy.

Designed for fans who follow more than one sport, it brings together real-time action, nearby events, and clean native performance so you can track, plan, and relive every game day with zero friction.

Features Highlights:

• Live scores filtered by status across Football, NFL, NHL, Baseball, Rugby, Cricket, and more

• Add games to your Calendar instantly — stay reminded of what matters

• Nearby events finder using GPS device location

• Smart favorites for all sports

• Match details zone: stats, info, and play-by-play game events

• Works privately — no account required, all data stays on your device

Made to be simple, fast, and useful for following your favorite sports and matches. 

- Note:
A pro subscription is needed to get access to all the app’s functionalities, and pro access unlocks:
• Unlimited live scores for all sports
• Access to all nearby games
• Unlimited favorites and calendar scheduling
• Access unlimited games stats and detail
• 100% ad-free experience

Subscription options: Weekly, Monthly, Yearly, or Lifetime.
Auto-renewable, cancel anytime in Settings › Subscriptions.

- Please note: 
This app helps you get live scores, nearby games, and explore games stats and details with easy favorites and scheduling — no live video or match streaming included.

Whether you are a seasoned follower of the game or a new fan Cricbuzz app has you covered.

Cricket Australia Live is your No.1 destination for live cricket scores, match coverage, breaking news, video highlights and in-depth feature stories.

CricHeroes is the ultimate cricket scoring app to digitally score your local cricket matches, live stream them, and organise tournaments like a professional.
Join millions of passionate cricketers using the #1 Cricket Scorer App to make grassroots cricket world-class!

Live Scoring & Match Analytics:
Broadcast your live cricket scores ball by ball and get an international-grade scorecard — completely FREE!
Enjoy detailed cricket analytics like Wagon Wheel, Manhattan, Worm, Run Rate, MVP, and more.
Let your friends and family follow live scores, commentary, and full scorecards in real time.

Live Streaming & AI Highlights:
Live stream your matches and tournaments just like professional games using only a mobile phone or tools like OBS, VMix, or other broadcast software.
Get automatic AI-generated highlights of your matches after every game.
Relive your best cricket moments and share them instantly with your friends, teammates, and followers.

Your Cricket Profile & Recognition:
Build your world-class cricket profile with in-depth batting and bowling stats — just like the pros!
Earn badges, awards, and leaderboard rankings for your on-field achievements.  Check your and your team’s ranking in city, state, and national leaderboards and celebrate top performers in your area.  CricHeroes Awards – The only global grassroots cricket awards! Perform consistently to win one.

Use CricInsights to analyse performances, track your form, understand your strengths, and improve your game.

Find & Connect with the Cricket Community:
Find cricket teams, opponents, players, umpires, and grounds easily for your next match.
Find Cricketers – Discover players from your contacts and follow their journey. Cheer for them, and celebrate their top performances.
Smart Search – Search players, tournaments, teams, clubs, grounds, and academies using voice search.

For Tournament Organisers:
Run your cricket tournaments professionally and completely FREE with CricHeroes!
Create a beautiful tournament page with leaderboard, points table, schedule, boundary tracker, and live scoring.
Smart Auto-Schedule Generator – Generate tournament fixtures in seconds.  Smart NRR Calculator – Know exactly what your team needs to reach the next stage.

CricHeroes Store:
Buy exclusive CricHeroes-branded cricket apparel and gear at unbeatable prices.  Get premium-quality products trusted by players worldwide.

Cricket Feed & Community:
Stay connected with the world of cricket! Read about rules, education, trivia, quizzes, polls, and stories — all in one place.
Register as a scorer, umpire, or commentator and get more match opportunities in your area.  PRO Club – An exclusive community for CricHeroes PRO users to connect, share, and grow together.

Cricket Associations:
Follow official matches and tournaments of 50+ ICC Associations and 23+ BCCI State Associations.
Track the journey of aspiring cricketers and appreciate grassroots cricket talent.

CricHeroes is built by passionate cricketers, for cricketers and fans around the world.
With 40M+ users, 10M+ matches scored, and a 4.7+ rating, CricHeroes is the No. 1 FREE Cricket Scoring App globally.

Let us know your feedback and suggestions to improve the app. We are just one phone call away at +918141665555.

Sportity is a Sport Event Information Distribution App for all kinds of sport events. The app helps organisers to distribute event related information to all the participants quickly and efficiently.

Participants can be divided into different categories so that they receive information only relevant to them. For example, Media will have its own category for their specific needs (media shuttle schedule, press center opening times etc). The organising committee will have its own information available through the app and teams all the information relevant for them. In addition to specific information, all users can have results, starting times etc available through the app.

Participants need to download the app and enter a password which will take them directly to the information according to their profile. The password will be made available from the organiser.

The organiser needs to contact Sportity Ltd for the use of the app.

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications

• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.

Athlete Central is the World Anti-Doping Agency’s all-new application for Athletes.  Powered by the Anti-Doping Administration and Management System (ADAMS), Athlete Central is the easiest, fastest, and most secure way for athletes in a Registered Testing Pool (RTP) to provide their whereabouts information in order to support out of competition testing and demonstrate their commitment to clean sport!

Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC

Get unrivalled coverage of Europe's ultimate club football competition. The official UEFA Champions League app brings you the latest soccer news, scores, draws, live coverage, next-day video highlights and our free Fantasy Football game.
 
FOLLOW THE UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE
 
- Get live minute-by-minute updates from every single match.
- With the live bracket, see the path to the final – and watch it update live as goals go in.
- Simulate scorelines and see how they might affect the knockout stages.
- Don’t miss a single goal thanks to real-time push notifications.
- Listen to live match commentary on the go.
- Review the goals in detail with next-day highlights for every match*.
- Get live match statistics for every game.
- Access all the fixtures and up-to-date standings.
- Read the latest football news and analysis from UEFA experts.
- Dive straight into the news that matters to you with our personalised home feed.
- Watch the live draws.
- Get a heads up with notifications for all kick-offs, confirmed line-ups and draws.
- Keep up to speed on each club thanks to in-depth form guides about the top teams in the Premier League, La Liga, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Analyse individual team pages, squads and player pages
- Have your say by voting for your Player and Goal of the Week after each matchday.
 
EXPLORE THE ARCHIVES
 
- Access all-time player statistics: everything from the top goalscorer to the most yellow cards.
- Access all-time club statistics and results: everything from the most titles to the most goals conceded.
- Browse stats and videos from past winners such as Real Madrid, Liverpool, Barcelona, Ajax, AC Milan, Manchester United, Juventus, Bayern Munich, Chelsea and more.
- Watch match highlights from past seasons. 
- Watch highlight compilations curated by UEFA experts.
 
PLAY FANTASY FOOTBALL
 
- Play our free Fantasy game and pick your UCL dream team from Europe’s best soccer stars, including players from La Liga, the Premier League, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Spend your €100m budget wisely and score points based on your players’ real-life performances.
- Compete against your friends by creating and joining leagues.
- Check player stats to make the best selection decisions.
- Join leagues with other supporters from your club. If you’re a Real Madrid fan, compete against other Real Madrid fans. If you’re a Juventus fan, battle against other Juventus fans on the Juve fans’ leaderboard.
- Play Fantasy Football and live UEFA Champions League nights in a whole new way!

*Highlights available from midnight wherever you are in the world

Want to stay connected to all things Champions League?
Download the app for free now to get the definitive UEFA Champions League coverage, straight from the home of European football.

Ten Sports is a Pakistani sports television channel. It was launched in 2002 and has since become the most popular sports channel in Pakistan. The channel is dedicated to broadcasting a wide range of sports events, including cricket, football, hockey, tennis, and other popular sports.

Ten Sports has the exclusive broadcasting rights for major sports events such as the Pakistan Super League (PSL), International Cricket Council (ICC) events, Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) events, and various domestic and international sports leagues.
Ten Sports channel also features various sports analysis programs, expert opinions, and talk shows to keep its viewers up-to-date with the latest sports news and happenings. Ten Sports broadcasts live cricket tv 24 hours a day, and its programs can be accessed through cable and satellite networks across Pakistan and some other countries.

Not just live scores, this app also provides live match toss and playing 11 updates, news updates and you will also be able to check upcoming Cricket matches schedule, browse upcoming Cricket series of team India, and all the other International Cricket teams and T20 leagues schedules.

The official app of FIFA World Cup 26™. Follow every match with live scores, fixtures, line-ups, advanced stats, fantasy games, ticket information, and highlights-crafted for a premium, global fan experience.

Live match centers: Real-time scores, line-ups, formations, and player ratings.
Fixtures & schedules: Browse by date, team, group, stage.
Standings & brackets: Live group tables, knockout brackets, and progression paths.
Stats: Team trends, player leaders, records, and match insights that matter.
Tickets & key dates: Official ticket info, timelines, and event guidance in one place.
Highlights & recaps: Must-see videos, condensed match recaps, and editorial news.
Personalization: Follow your favorite team to get tailored feeds and notifications.
Smart alerts: Kick-off, goals, cards, full‑time.

Built for FIFA World Cup 26™

Fast, clear, reliable: A smooth experience on matchday and every day.
Global and local: Follow the world’s tournament your way with content that fits your interests.
Official and trusted: The authentic destination for FIFA World Cup 26™ updates.

From the opening match to the final, FIFA World Cup 26™ keeps you connected to fixtures, form, and the moments that define the tournament. Track every goal, analyze performance, and relive every highlight—wherever you are.

This is just the start: some FIFA World Cup 26™ features aren’t available yet, with new updates and exclusive content rolling out ahead of the tournament.

Download now and experience FIFA World Cup 26™ with live scores, smarter stats, and the official matchday companion in your pocket.

We're excited to introduce a whole new level of cricket engagement with our latest update. Dive into the fresh features that await:

Sleek New Design: Embrace the excitement of cricket with our revamped interface! The app now sports a cleaner, more user-friendly design, making your experience smoother and more enjoyable. Navigate effortlessly to find what you love faster.

Faster Performance: Speed matters, both on the field and in your app experience. We've turbocharged the performance of the ICC app, ensuring quicker load times, smoother transitions, and a more responsive interface. Never miss a beat of the action!

Video Hub: Your one-stop destination for all things cricket! Access a comprehensive collection of LIVE International cricket on ICC.tv, in selected territories. Plus, thrilling match highlights, exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes footage from ICC events, to immerse yourself in the world of cricket like never before.
